name: Intermediate Game Dev Midterm
description:
Mouse to look 

Standing: WS to move forward and back

Iphone: WASD to move

IPhone + Kindle: click to interact

Assignment Questions:

(1) My game is about my commute to school every day. It is supposed to emulate my boredom. You have access to a few of the things that i use to make the train ride go by faster.  I wanted to try and portray why I hate my commute to others.

(2) The hardest part of the project was the 3D modeling just because maya consistently crashed on me over and over. it was very frustrating for the objects that took more work. The best part was the programming and figuring out how to make everything function together. It was difficult but also very enjoyable to figure out the tougher problems.
